description: Describes basic attributes of the NYT user.

audience_split_ids.description: An array of 2-item arrays, containing audience ID and split ID pairs.

regiId.description: The NYT registration ID of the NYT user.

type.description: A value that indicates the type of NYT user

lastUpdate.description: It will return the timestamp if last update in milliseconds.

isNewsSubscriber.description: This flag returns either 0 or 1 to identify new subscribers.

watSegs.description: segments under ‘wat’ in the NYT-D cookie

propensity.description: Metadata about the user's propensity to subscribe

tracking.description: Metadata about the user's latest behavior on our site
